fields.name: add_logbook_entry
fields.description: Add an entry to the logbook

fields.name: add_project_match_assignments
fields.description: Add assigned employees to a project

fields.name: delete_project_match_assignments
fields.description: Delete assigned employees from a project

fields.name: update_project_match_assignments
fields.description: Updates a list of manual assigned user in project on base of given user ids

fields.name: update_tracking_time
fields.description: Updates tracking times for current user

fields.name: update_user_data
fields.description: Updates the current user's contact data

fields.name: upload_image
fields.description: Add a previously uploaded image to a final target object. The image must be uploaded beforehand via the REST upload endpoint.

fields.name: delete_company_account
fields.description: Deletes the company account and all data

fields.name: delete_calendar_import
fields.description: Delete a calendar_import by its UID

fields.name: create_payment
fields.description: Creates a new payment for the given document

fields.name: add_field_service_job_assignment
fields.description: Add assigned employee to a job

fields.name: remove_field_service_job_assignment
fields.description: Remove assigned employee from a job

fields.name: create_stock_material
fields.description: Creates a new stock material entity and sources if provided.

fields.name: create_custom_field_schema
fields.description: create a schema for custom fields

fields.name: add_custom_fields_to_schema
fields.description: Add a custom field to a schema

fields.name: update_custom_fields_in_schema
fields.description: Update one or more custom fields in schema

fields.name: set_custom_field_value
fields.description: Set the value of a custom field for a given relation. It can not exceed 10kb in size.
